name: Shadow Manor
description:
Can you escape Shadow Manor? Explore all 100 puzzling rooms of the Shadow Manor in hopes that solving each room will get you one room closer to escaping.

You've entered into mansion of horror as the all consuming SHADOW is only a few steps behind you. If you cannot solve the puzzle of each room in time, pray that you can outrun the SHADOW.

Only the fastest and most observant will survive!

Features:

• Pixel Art Graphics

• 90 Levels

• The Original "Time Trial" Normal mode in which you have a limited amount of time to complete each level

• A "Puzzle Only" mode where the time limit is removed and you can play at your own pace

• Simple W A S D controls
